alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Crawford; Houston; Jones; Peach; Twiggs; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 8:06PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Wilkinson, Bibb, Twiggs, Peach, northern Houston, eastern Crawford and southeastern Jones Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 806 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Huber, or 10 miles southeast of Macon, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Macon, Perry, Fort Valley, Jeffersonville, Irwinton, Warner Robins, Centerville, Byron, Gordon, Ivey, McIntyre, Toomsboro, Danville, Payne, Allentown, Robins AFB, Payne City, Marion, Lake Tobesofkee and Robins Air Force Base. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Bibb; Crawford; Houston; Jones; Peach; Twiggs; Wilkinson
